title: Here to there
creator_credit: Roy A. Driver and Herschells Films
brief_description: Shows some aspects of Australian road transport and demonstrates the indispensable role of motor transport in the swift transit of goods, ranging from the smallest parcels, to wool and heavy machinery. Concludes with the moving of a giant 32-ton gas generator 90 miles by road.
